message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $120. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $90 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. While I appreciate your interest, $90 is unfortunately below what I can accept for this product. I'm willing to come down to $110, reflecting both the value of the product and your interest. What do you think?

Hello Alice, I understand your position. I am still committed to finding a fair price for your product. I would like to counter with an offer of $100. This is my final offer, as I am also considering purchasing the product from another seller.
